title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 4 and 32. The northbound and southbound roadways of US Route 4 and Route 32 overlap from
the northerly limit of the Village of Stillwater southerly through the Village
of Stillwater, Town of Stillwater and City of Mechanicville to a point 4.46+-
miles south of Route 146 in the Town of Halfmoon (RM 1031+-). (b) Route 146. Route 146 from its easterly
terminus at the junction of US Route 4 and Route 32 westerly to Twenty First

Century Park Road in the Towns of Halfmoon and Clifton Park. (c) Route 9N. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 9N between Van Dam Street in the City of Saratoga Springs and

Mechanic Street in the Village of Corinth, in the City of Saratoga Springs, the

Village of Corinth, and the Towns of Corinth and Greenfield. (d) US Route 9. The northbound and southbound
roadways of US Route 9 between Adelphi Street and IR 87, Exit 13, in the City
of Saratoga Springs and the Town of Malta. (e) Route 9N. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 9N between Maple Street and the Saratoga/Warren county line
in the Village of Corinth and the Towns of Corinth and Hadley. (f) Route 29. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 29 from the Washington county line to Weibel Avenue in the

Town of Saratoga, the City of Saratoga Springs and the Village of

Schuylerville, a distance of 9.6+- miles. (g) Weibel Avenue. The northbound and
southbound roadways of Weibel Avenue from Route 29 to Route 50 in the City of

Saratoga Springs and the Town of Wilton, a distance of 1.2+- miles. (h) Route 50. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 50 from Weibel Avenue to Van Dam Street in the City of

Saratoga Springs and the Town of Wilton. (i) Harrison Avenue. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Harrison Avenue between the NIBCO, Inc. terminal and

Sisson road, a town highway, in the Village of South Glens Falls and the Town
of Moreau. (j) US Route 9. US Route
9 between the southbound on-ramp of IR 87 and exit 17 and the City of Glens

Falls. (k) Route 29. Route 29
between Fulton county/Saratoga county line and West Avenue in the Towns of

Galway, Milton and City of Saratoga Springs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8141.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
